This action will permanently erase the selected energy meter and all the records associated with it, do you want to proceed? Beginning of period Billing period details Last reading date Period length Period consumption details Period Consumption
Estimated daily consumption %1$s kWh Consumption calculator Pulses per kWh
This tool was designed to calculate the real-time power consumption based on the number of pulses emitted by your energy meter in a specific time period.
\n\nTo achieve this it is necessary that you know how many pulses per kWh your equipment emits, this information is found in front of the meter.
\n\n(Eg 1600 imp / kWh, that is, for each kilowatt-hour of energy consumption, your meter emits 1,600 flashes of light.)
\n\n For a better calculation start the chronometer with the first impulse and stop it with the last, the minimum pulses required are two, however for a more accurate calculation enter 5 to 10 minimum flashes by clicking each in the consumption part of the screen.
